hero.title: Paper Submission
hero.subtitle: Share Your Innovations with the World

guidelines.intro: We invite you to share your latest research and innovations at SMART-25. Your work will gain valuable visibility and open doors for networking and future partnerships within the field of Sustainable Multidisciplinary Artificial Intelligence.
steps: Submit your abstract online through the dedicated Google Form.
Only one theme can be selected per submission.
Submissions by post, fax, or email are not accepted.
Abstracts must be in English, up to 250 words, and formatted using the official template.

publicationPartners.intro: Accepted manuscripts will be considered for publication in the following SCOPUS-indexed journals and book chapters:
